{"id":278483225,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years, 6 months","timestamp":1573655832,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/278483225/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int i; \n        int len = s.length(); \n        int st = 0; \n        int currlen; \n        int maxlen = 0; \n        int start; \n        unordered_map<char, int> pos; \n        pos[s[0]] = 0; \n  \n        for (i = 1; i < len; i++) { \n            if (pos.find(s[i]) == pos.end()) \n                pos[s[i]] = i; \n            else { \n                if (pos[s[i]] >= st) { \n                    currlen = i - st; \n                if (maxlen < currlen) { \n                    maxlen = currlen; \n                    start = st; \n                } \n                st = pos[s[i]] + 1; \n            } \n            pos[s[i]] = i; \n        } \n    } \n    if (maxlen < i - st) { \n        maxlen = i - st; \n        start = st; \n    } \n  \n    //return s.substr(start, maxlen); \n        return maxlen;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false}
